item.title: Google Ads only for googlers
item.author: vinod@kurup.com (Vinod Kurup, MD)
item.description: I saw this great idea over at this place called Raganwald. Only show ads to visitors who come in from search engines. I really don’t want friends and family to see ads, so this effectively shields them since they will probably come here by typing kurup.org in the address bar or using a bookmark. You’re welcome :-)
